alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued February 21 at 12:09PM MST until February 21 at 2:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 200 PM MST. * At 1205 PM MST, a dust channel was 18 miles west of Diamond Creek Campground, or 41 miles northeast of Kingman, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility. SOURCE...Emergency Management. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * Antares Road, and portions of Route 66 near Antares Road, and Stockton Hill Road. Locations impacted include... Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground, Grand Canyon Ranch and Dolan Springs. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
